ooc: only Scorponok is in the room with nightshift. Hydras is
elsewhere as is Cyclonus and Scourge. So Nightshift should not be
aware that Hydras knows yet.

Preston


On 3/30/10, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> Night Shift transforms and watches the visual of Tucson Prime.  He was
> ecstatic about the change, yet he couldn't quite express that joy in front
> of Hydras, Cyclonus, Scorponok, or Rodimus, in fear of exposing his true
> faction.  Instead he makes a rather angry scowl.
>
> "Slag!  Son of a Glitch! How'd he do that?!  I swear I kicked his aft from
> here ta the next galaxy, I don't get it!  Look, I dunno how he did that, and
> when he did it, but he just snatched up the power from Prime's matrix!
> Should've expected it though, seen' he's actually related ta the bot.  Okay,
> so what I got ta tell ya is I think he's plann'n an all out assault on you
> guys, like tryn' ta take this place for the Maximals and Autobots.  Wants ta
> level the fortress ta the ground.  What I think we gotta do is beat 'em at
> his own game.  And he knows we're gonna try'n get at the Ark, and if we go
> there, we're done for.  See? It's not easy gettn' around the guy because he
> ain't your average scrap heap.  He don't think like an average Autobot.  So,
> if I were you guys, that shell program you got gon' on, I think ya better
> have a bot make a backup of that'n hold onto it.  Because he's gonna try'n
> blow this place sky high, and everything with it.  And as far as I know
> he'll be barrelln' in here with the rest of his posse any time now."
>
> Of course he was telling them a complete lie, hoping they'd buy it.  His
> tone shows no indication of telling a fib.  Inside he was hoping that his
> idea mixed with Tucson's would take hold.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>>
>> > "Speak"said the male to Cyclonus
>>
>> Next to Hydras a small view screen came to life and began to show a
>> short clip of a large truck like vehicle that was leaving the Ark,
>> bearing a distinctive likeness to Optimus Prime, almost like a cross
>> between his Earthen mode and his original cybertronian mode. There was
>> the cab front and the trailer on back, the trailer sporting two large
>> and fearsome looking missiles. The truck looked powerful enough and
>> regugged enough to roll over the most inhospitable terrain without
>> slowing. It was currently moving at a sedate 55 mph.
>>
>> "From the reading I am getting that is . . . or was . . . Tuscon."
>> Cyclonus paused to let the import of his next words to sink in, "I
>> believe they have found a way to utilize the Matrix."
>>
>> (TAG)
>>
>> Preston
>>
>
>
>
